bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  更　　新  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '周一',
    '周二',
    '周三',
    '周四',
    '周五',
    '周六',
    '周日'
];
orderby = [
    '1',
    '2',
    '3',
    '4',
    '5',
    '6',
    '7'
];
Gengxin = `{{get('gengxin',Get('ci0'))}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Gengxin}/${orderby[i]}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (rank.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (rank.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','长条','大女主','百合','耽美','纯爱','後宫','韩漫',
    '奇幻','轻小说','生活','悬疑','格斗','搞笑','伪娘','竞技',
    '职场','萌系','冒险','治愈','都市','霸总','神鬼','侦探',
    '爱情','古风','欢乐向','科幻','穿越','性转换','校园','美食',
    '剧情','热血','节操','励志','异世界','历史','战争','恐怖'
];
Shudan = `{{get('shudan',Get('ci0'))}}`;
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Shudan}/${Region}/${kind[j]}/${State}/{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID1 = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID1; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "         ①最次元❶          ", type: "button", action: "$(1)"},
  { name: "           ②野蛮❷           ", type: "button", action: "$(2)"},
  { name: "           ③开心❸            ", type: "button", action: "$(3)"},
  { name: "           ④次元❹            ", type: "button", action: "$(4)"},

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换地区  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      全 部      ", type: "button", action: "o(0)" },
  { name: "      国 漫      ", type: "button", action: "o(1)" },
  { name: "      日 漫     ", type: "button", action: "o(2)" },
  { name: "      韩 漫      ", type: "button", action: "o(3)" },
  { name: "     未分类    ", type: "button", action: "o(4)" },
  { name: "                     ", type: "button"},

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换进度  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      全 部      ", type: "button", action: "q(0)" },
  { name: "      连 载      ", type: "button", action: "q(1)" },
  { name: "      完 结      ", type: "button", action: "q(2)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

'〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🗺当前地区：〖' + (Get('o') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + y[Get('o')]) + ('\n⏲️漫画进度：〖' + (Get('q') == 0 ? var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    if(result.includes('CAPTCHA')){
        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
        java.setContent(java.get(baseUrl,Headers).body());
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.item.comic-item');
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.title').text(),
            'author': '',
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': list[i].select('.chapter').text(),
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].select('.img').attr('src'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    if (!baseUrl.includes("shudan")) {
        Data();
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).html/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.html';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.item.comic-item')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    if(result.includes('CAPTCHA')){
        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
        java.setContent(java.get(baseUrl,Headers).body());
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.comic-chapter-item');
    date = '〔' + java.getElements('.update_time').text() + '〕';
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + date : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].select('.comic-chapter-link').attr('href')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>
